doc.title: 2008 Ultimate Mormon Lake Team Roping
doc.plot: Thirteen exciting complete short go rounds from the Jack Fuller 4th of July Team Roping held in the beautiful town of Mormon Lake, Arizona. This DVD brings you all the short go rounds plus the All Girl Team Roping held over the 4th of July weekend.

Thirteen exciting complete short go rounds from the Jack Fuller 4th of July Team Roping held in the beautiful town of Mormon Lake, Arizona. This DVD brings you all the short go rounds plus the All Girl Team Roping held over the 4th of July weekend.
